traits.name: Active
traits.description: These Sims tend to be Energized, can Pump Up other Sims, and may become upset if they don't exercise for a period of time.

traits.name: Ambitious
traits.description: These Sims gain powerful Moodlets from career success, gain negative Moodlets from career failure, and may become Tense if not promoted.

traits.name: Art Lover
traits.description: These Sims gain powerful Moodlets from viewing works of art and can Discuss Art in an animated way.

traits.name: Bookworm
traits.description: These Sims gain powerful Moodlets from reading books and can Share Favorite Book with other Sims.

traits.name: Cheerful
traits.description: These Sims tend to be Happier than other Sims.

traits.name: Childish
traits.description: These Sims playfully embrace their inner child. They can Play with Children's Toys regardless of age and become Happy around children.

traits.name: Clumsy
traits.description: These Sims tend to fail more often at physical activities and tend to laugh at failure.

traits.name: Creative
traits.description: These Sims tend to be Inspired, can Share Creative Ideas with other Sims, and may become upset if they're not creative for a period of time.

traits.name: Evil
traits.description: These Sims become Happy around Sims with negative Moodlets, can be Mean to other Sims, and become Angry when witnessing altruistic behavior.

traits.name: Family-Oriented
traits.description: These Sims become Happy and build stronger relationships around family members. They can Discuss Family at any time.

traits.name: Foodie
traits.description: These Sims are passionate about food. They become Happy when eating good food and can Discuss Favorite Food and Critique Cooking.

traits.name: Genius
traits.description: These Sims tend to be Focused, can Share Big Ideas with other Sims, and may become upset if they're not intellectually stimulated.

traits.name: Gloomy
traits.description: These Sims tend to be Sad more often than other Sims.

traits.name: Good
traits.description: These Sims become Happy when helping other Sims and become Sad when witnessing negative behavior.

traits.name: Goofball
traits.description: These Sims become Playful more often and can Tell Jokes to other Sims.

traits.name: Hates Children
traits.description: These Sims become Tense around children and may become Angry when children are present.

traits.name: Hot-Headed
traits.description: These Sims become Angry more easily and can Rant to other Sims.

traits.name: Insane
traits.description: These Sims can Talk to Themselves and may experience random mood changes.

traits.name: Jealous
traits.description: These Sims become Tense when their romantic partner interacts with other Sims.

traits.name: Kleptomaniac
traits.description: These Sims can Steal items from other Sims' homes and may feel the urge to steal.

traits.name: Lazy
traits.description: These Sims become Tired more quickly and prefer relaxing activities.

traits.name: Loner
traits.description: These Sims become Tense around strangers, become Embarrassed more often in social situations, but gain powerful Moodlets when alone.

traits.name: Loves Outdoors
traits.description: These Sims become Happy when outside and become Sad when they've been inside for too long.

traits.name: Mean
traits.description: These Sims become Happy when being Mean or Mischievous to other Sims and become Sad when around positive Moodlets.

traits.name: Music Lover
traits.description: These Sims gain powerful Moodlets from listening to music and can Discuss Favorite Music with other Sims.

traits.name: Neat
traits.description: These Sims become Uncomfortable in dirty surroundings, can Clean more efficiently, and can Discuss Cleanliness Standards.

traits.name: Noncommittal
traits.description: These Sims become Bored more quickly and tend to quit social interactions and activities earlier than other Sims.

traits.name: Outgoing
traits.description: These Sims become Happy when around other Sims and become Sad when alone for too long.

traits.name: Perfectionist
traits.description: These Sims take longer to craft items but tend to make them higher quality, and can Discuss Perfectionism with other Sims.

traits.name: Romantic
traits.description: These Sims become Flirty more often and can Discuss Romantic Literature with other Sims.

traits.name: Self-Assured
traits.description: These Sims tend to be Confident, can Pump Up other Sims, and will become Confident more often than other Sims.

traits.name: Slob
traits.description: These Sims are not affected by dirty surroundings, make household items dirty more quickly, and can Discuss Mess with other Sims.

traits.name: Snob
traits.description: These Sims become Confident around Sims with refined tastes and become Uncomfortable around Sims that are less refined.

traits.name: Unflirty
traits.description: These Sims become Embarrassed more easily in romantic situations and may struggle with romantic interactions.

traits.name: Unlucky
traits.description: These Sims experience more negative random events and may have worse luck in various activities.

traits.name: Vegetarian
traits.description: These Sims become Uncomfortable when eating meat and prefer vegetarian meals.

traits.name: Workaholic
traits.description: These Sims become Tense when not working and may work longer hours than other Sims.

traits.name: Business Savvy
traits.description: These Sims are better at running businesses and gain bonuses in business-related activities.

traits.name: Dance Machine
traits.description: These Sims become Happy when dancing and can perform special dance moves.

traits.name: Bro
traits.description: These Sims become Happy when working out with friends and can perform special social interactions.

traits.name: Party Animal
traits.description: These Sims become Happy at parties and may become Sad when not partying enough.

traits.name: City Native
traits.description: These Sims become Happy in urban environments and may struggle in rural settings.

traits.name: Street Art
traits.description: These Sims can create street art and gain inspiration from urban environments.

traits.name: Food Critic
traits.description: These Sims can critique food and gain bonuses when eating at restaurants.

traits.name: Animal Whisperer
traits.description: These Sims have better relationships with animals and can train them more effectively.

traits.name: Cat Lover
traits.description: These Sims become Happy around cats and may prefer feline companions.

traits.name: Dog Lover
traits.description: These Sims become Happy around dogs and may prefer canine companions.

traits.name: Weather Pensive
traits.description: These Sims become Focused during certain weather conditions and may contemplate more.

traits.name: Storm Chaser
traits.description: These Sims become Excited during storms and may seek out extreme weather.

traits.name: Attention Seeker
traits.description: These Sims become Happy when in the spotlight and may become Sad when ignored.

traits.name: Dramatic
traits.description: These Sims experience emotions more intensely and may overreact to situations.

traits.name: Diva
traits.description: These Sims become Confident when treated like celebrities and may demand special treatment.

traits.name: Child of the Islands
traits.description: These Sims become Happy in island environments and may struggle in urban settings.

traits.name: Beach Life
traits.description: These Sims become Happy at the beach and may prefer coastal living.

traits.name: Quick Learner
traits.description: These Sims learn skills faster and may excel in academic environments.

traits.name: Socially Awkward
traits.description: These Sims may struggle in social situations and become Embarrassed more easily.

traits.name: Responsible
traits.description: These Sims are more likely to complete tasks and may become Tense when things are disorganized.

traits.name: Environmentalist
traits.description: These Sims become Happy when engaging in eco-friendly activities and may become Sad when witnessing pollution.

traits.name: Freegan
traits.description: These Sims prefer to live sustainably and may avoid traditional consumerism.

traits.name: Adventurous
traits.description: These Sims become Excited when exploring new places and may seek out thrilling experiences.

traits.name: Proper
traits.description: These Sims prefer formal behavior and may become Uncomfortable in casual situations.

traits.name: Animal Enthusiast
traits.description: These Sims become Happy around all types of animals and may prefer rural living.

traits.name: Simple Living
traits.description: These Sims prefer a minimalist lifestyle and may become Uncomfortable with excessive luxury.

traits.name: Overachiever
traits.description: These Sims strive for excellence and may become Tense when not performing at their best.

traits.name: Socially Gifted
traits.description: These Sims excel in social situations and may become popular more easily.

traits.name: Close-Knit
traits.description: These Sims value family relationships and may become Sad when separated from loved ones.

traits.name: Loyal
traits.description: These Sims are committed to their relationships and may become Angry when betrayed.

traits.name: Horse Lover
traits.description: These Sims become Happy around horses and may prefer equestrian activities.

traits.name: Country Living
traits.description: These Sims prefer rural environments and may become Uncomfortable in urban settings.

traits.name: Community-Oriented
traits.description: These Sims value community relationships and may become Happy when helping neighbors.

traits.name: Homebody
traits.description: These Sims become Happy at home and may become Uncomfortable when away for too long.

traits.name: Angelic
traits.description: These toddlers are well-behaved and rarely cause trouble.

traits.name: Charmer
traits.description: These toddlers are naturally charming and can easily win over adults.

traits.name: Clumsy
traits.description: These toddlers are more likely to fall and make messes.

traits.name: Fussy
traits.description: These toddlers are picky eaters and may be harder to please.

traits.name: Independent
traits.description: These toddlers prefer to do things on their own and may resist help.

traits.name: Inquisitive
traits.description: These toddlers are curious and love to explore their surroundings.

traits.name: Silly
traits.description: These toddlers are playful and love to make others laugh.

traits.name: Wild
traits.description: These toddlers are energetic and may be harder to control.

traits.name: Calm
traits.description: These infants are generally peaceful and easy to care for.

traits.name: Cautious
traits.description: These infants are wary of new experiences and may need more reassurance.

traits.name: Fussy
traits.description: These infants are easily upset and may cry more often.

traits.name: Giggly
traits.description: These infants laugh easily and bring joy to those around them.

traits.name: Intense
traits.description: These infants experience emotions strongly and may be more dramatic.

traits.name: Sunny
traits.description: These infants are generally happy and pleasant to be around.

traits.name: Wiggly
traits.description: These infants are active and may be harder to hold or change.

traits.name: Paranoid
traits.description: These Sims become Tense more easily and may be suspicious of others' motives.

traits.name: Squeamish
traits.description: These Sims become Uncomfortable around gross things and may avoid messy situations.

traits.name: Insider
traits.description: These Sims are well-connected and may have access to exclusive information or opportunities.

traits.name: Self-Absorbed
traits.description: These Sims are focused on themselves and may struggle to empathize with others.

traits.name: Lactose Intolerant
traits.description: These Sims become Uncomfortable when consuming dairy products.

traits.name: Maker
traits.description: These Sims enjoy crafting and creating things with their hands.

traits.name: Recycle Disciple
traits.description: These Sims are passionate about recycling and reducing waste.

traits.name: Green Fiend
traits.description: These Sims are obsessed with eco-friendly living and may judge others for wasteful behavior.

traits.name: Child of the Ocean
traits.description: These Sims have a deep connection to the ocean and marine life.

traits.name: Practice Makes Perfect
traits.description: These Sims gain skill faster through repetitive practice.

traits.name: Cringe
traits.description: These Sims may make others feel Embarrassed with their awkward behavior.

traits.name: Nosy
traits.description: These Sims are curious about others' business and may eavesdrop or gossip.

traits.name: Generous
traits.description: These Sims enjoy giving gifts and helping others, often at their own expense.

traits.name: Rancher
traits.description: These Sims are skilled at caring for livestock and prefer rural living.

traits.name: Champion
traits.description: These Sims are competitive and strive to be the best at everything they do.
